alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 11:01AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Geauga and Lake Counties Until noon EST.... At 1100 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 10 miles north of Fairport Harbor to near Painesville to near Burton, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, South Russell, Middlefield, Perry, Burton, Chesterland, Willoughby Hills, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Chagrin Falls, Huntsburg, Claridon, North Perry, Bainbridge and Hunting Valley. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/cle and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 326, 330, and 331.
